history.content:
The department will most likely have a separate policy. My guess will be that it will be similar to the one they proposed last semester which was: All classes can be PNP'd, however, prerequisite classes such as CS61A, CS61B, and CS70 can be PNP'd, but the actual grade will be considered for the calculation to declare. There are other conditions as well from Fall semester as well, such as PNPing the class and retaking it another semester, using EE16A grade for CS70 if taken the same semester, using 61A grade for 61B grade if you are currently enrolled in CS61B.

Hope this helps.

----

@13639

Hi I just saw the email, do the department have a separate policy or we just follow the college’s policy. Can we take pnp for this semester’s cs prerequisites and still declare?
history.subject: Could we take pnp for cs prerequisites and still declare in L&S
